body:
Hi Mostapha, I post the problems I encountered when trying to specify OpenFOAM environmental variable and run OpenFOAM on CFD-online: [http://www.cfd-online.com/Forums/openfoam-installation/174194-openf...](http://www.cfd-online.com/Forums/openfoam-installation/174194-openform-windows-1606-doesnt-run.html) The installation of the latest OpenFOAM 1606 on Windows 7 64bit is OK. However, when I click the "OF_Create_Env" shortcut on desktop, i got the error message (see image 01 below) informing me the access to the registry key "...PowerShell" is denied, and I can't start the OpenFOAM Containerized Windows Version.

If I click the "OpenFOAM_Start" shortcut on desktop, I get another error (see image 02), saying "error setting up host..."

Both shortcuts are executed as admin. The error messages are attached here. Appreciate your kind advice!
